sentences.english: If credit growth roars on, the Chinese central bank will have a lot of trouble controlling inflation.
sentences.chinese: 如果信贷持续增加，央行控制通货膨胀将步履维艰。

sentences.english: In the UK. an array of technical fixes is already making 9 life harder for car thieves.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，一系列的技术装置已经让盗车贼步履维艰了。

sentences.english: The unreasonable funds construction can make the development of the geologic prospecting units stagnation.
sentences.chinese: 资金结构的不合理使一些地勘单位的发展步履维艰。
